quick_look
```{r, echo = TRUE}
data(anscombe)
```

xy_plot
```{r sessionSetup, include=TRUE}
options (echo = FALSE,
                    fig.path = './figures/',
                    fig.align = 'center',
                    fig.width = 8,
                    fig.height = 8,
                    dev = 'svg')
data("anscombe")
plot(anscombe$x1,anscombe$y1,main = "plot of X1 and Y1",xlab= "X1",ylab = "Y1")
abline(lm(y1 ~ x1, data = anscombe))
                    
```
